thread.title: South Korea halts DMZ propaganda broadcasts

title: South Korea halts DMZ propaganda broadcasts
text:
South Korea halts DMZ propaganda broadcasts   01:50 
South Korea has halted its propaganda broadcasts at the border with North Korea ahead of the first planned summit between the North and South in over a decade this coming Friday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Korea has halted its propaganda broadcasts at the border with North Korea ahead of the first planned summit between the North and South in over a decade this coming Friday. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HSNe1O
